attributes.action: Propose an Increase in MP's salaries with the average of all current expense claims and abolish the expense claim system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has become clear both the taxpayer and the ministers of parliament have an interest in abolishing the current expense claim system for ministers of parliament. Addition to the MP's fixed salary of an average of all current expense claims should suffice to operate both from London and from a constituency. To give the over expending MP's time to change their lifestyle the measure is proposed to take effect in 2011.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
